name: Glass Animals: Tokyo Drifting Legends
description:
Prototype of my Glass Animals game. I have created the level with 9 enemies and 5 stars that must be collected to win the game. I customized the colors of the tilemap to fit the Glass Animals theme and made the playable character look like one of the band members, Drew Macfarlane.

Movement: W, S, A, D keys and Spacebar.

Objective: Collect all 5 starts around the map without dying from enemies.
